info.name: Furaffinity - Dark and Shiny
info.description:
Version 2.3

Almost entirely re-vamped version of Dark Matte, now with more shiny.

Please report any bugs/feature requests to skippotter1 at gmail dot com

http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/5015/fa1web.jpg
http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/4476/fa2web.jpg
http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/4825/fa3web.jpg
http://img25.imageshack.us/img25/2830/fa4web.jpg
http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/4305/fa5web.jpg


-Changelog-
2.3
*Fixed* 
Firefox white-on-white textbox/textarea

2.2 
*Added*
Use max-width to limit image width, provide option on install.

*Fixed*

General
*Note-priority colors not displayed
*Some link colors off when using Dark stylesheet.
*UserCP-Menu a further 10% darker.

Chrome:
*UserCP-Menu displacing elements when collapsed
*Comment-Menu dropdown flickering
*Rogue border below comments.

Firefox:
*UserCP-Menu dropdown border visible on collapse.
